data.actual_result: NSFW channel toggle flashes as the previous toggle when the page is closing
data.expected_result: NSFW channel toggle stays in the position you toggled it to
data.short_description: Toggline the NSFW channel option on/off and pressing save shows the toggle in the previous position when closing
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can manage channels - Go into the channel settings of a random channel - Toggle the NSFW channel option on/off - Leaving the NSFW channel toggle in view, tap save - Observe the toggle as the channel settings close
